text: I'm on the side of "give people good tools". Let people choose when their stuff should be deleted. Give them a tool for "select all fully-disconnected wires" (something like Illustrator's pathfinder, perhaps). Make the "automatic" behaviour be something people can ask for, not something forced on them. Also, keeping wires around opens up so many new design possibilities.
